title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 822.2 - Maintenance of lists of approved attorneys
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 822.2 - Maintenance of lists of approved attorneys

State Regulations

The judge of each court having
countywide jurisdiction in a county which has not placed in operation a plan
conforming to that described in subdivision 3 of section
722
of the County

Law, shall submit to the Appellate Division on or before the first day of June
each year, a list of attorneys residing within such county for approval by the

Appellate Division for the purpose of assignment as counsel pursuant to section
35
of the

Judiciary Law. As far as practicable, a judge or justice shall assign attorneys
from the approved list in rotation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
822.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
